Description: Shoulder fragment of East Greek pottery oenochoe(?) with black-figure decoration. Outside, part of wing or tail with added red; below, bands; inside reserved . Light reddish fabric with micaeous inclusions.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 43, no. D 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.469)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.D 2 (cat. no. in Prins de Jong 1925)
